snippet.title: TheOfficeQuest Promotion movie
snippet.description: The Office Quest is a game about a bored guy, working in a boring office ( nobody knows why, but everybody in that office is dressed up in costumes), and about this guy’s quest to add some color to his gray and dull life. Walk through the office building, avoid annoying co-workers and angry bosses, collect useful items (can you describe a worm as a useful item?), solve puzzles and riddles, and hopefully have some fun.
